plot: Satire on Tony Blair's UK Government, adapted from a column in the magazine Private Eye, representing the Prime Minister as the Anglican priest of a small English parish.
plot_en: Satire on Tony Blair's UK Government, adapted from a column in the magazine Private Eye, representing the Prime Minister as the Anglican priest of a small English parish.
plot_es: Satire on Tony Blair's UK Government, adapted from a column in the magazine Private Eye, representing the Prime Minister as the Anglican priest of a small English parish.
title: Sermon from St Albion's
